Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
lista4.gameLogic.GameContext
public class GameContext extends Object
Represents the current context of a Go game. Keeps track of the current player, game state, and consecutive passes. Provides methods to control game flow (start, stop, next player, pass).

  • Method Summary

    Description
